Subskills.name: Hardened Sandstone
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by sand guardians.

Subskills.name: Durable Sand
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of sand guardians.

Subskills.name: Guardian Nevermore
Subskills.description: Sand guardians now move around with you dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Deserts Gladiators
Subskills.description: Chance to unleash an additional attack.

Subskills.name: Sand Frenzy
Subskills.description: Increases the attack speed of sand guardians.

Subskills.name: Battle IQ
Subskills.description: Sand guardians periodically dash a short distance towards the closest monster if not in combat.

Subskills.name: Reserve Army
Subskills.description: Chance to summon an additional sand guardian on cast.

Subskills.name: Lunge Attack
Subskills.description: Increases the attack range of sand guardians.

Subskills.name: Guardians of the Orbital Sand
Subskills.description: Sand guardians now orbit around you, striking nearby monsters. Sand guardians now have a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Dashing Sandstrike
Subskills.description: Chance on attack to dash through the target monster dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Sand's Edge
Subskills.description: Chance to critically hit dealing increased critical strike damage.

Subskills.name: Deadly Guardians
Subskills.description: Increases the size and damage dealt by sand guardians, decreasing the duration.

Subskills.name: Sand Mages
Subskills.description: Summon sand mages zapping monsters from afar with arcane surges.

Subskills.name: Sacrifice for the Throne
Subskills.description: Sand guardians immediately seek the nearest monster, charging towards it, exploding, and dealing increased damage, inflicting arcane break on hit.
